title: Complete the Data Mesh Pattern
description: Fill in the blanks to describe key data mesh concepts: domain ownership, data products, and federated governance.
hints: Domain teams own their data end-to-end
Data products have SLAs and documentation
optimalSolution: Data mesh shifts ownership to domain teams who treat data as products. Each domain publishes self-serve data products with discoverability, documentation, and SLAs. Federated governance enables autonomous decisions while maintaining interoperability standards.
explanation: Data mesh is a decentralized socio-technical approach. Domains own their data pipelines. Products are discoverable, addressable, trustworthy, and interoperable. Federated governance balances autonomy with enterprise standards.
